name: Baaaad Instructions
description:
A one-week prototype for the GSAS 4510 Experimental Game Design course at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. The theme of this project is "Ritual".

Credits

  • Josh Hacklander - Design, Programming
  • Ivan Ho - Design, Programming
  • Emily McNee - Design, Dialogue, SFX, Music, and UI Art
  • Kelly Wang - Design, Dialogue, 2D Art
